query.statement: INSERT INTO FCUS.CCS_EDU_MGMT ( UPJANG, EDU_SEQ, EDU_CD, EDU_SABUN, EDU_SDATE, EDU_EDATE, OBJ_CD, EDU_TIME_CD, OP_DEPT, CDATE, UUSER, UDATE, CUSER ) VALUES ( #UPJANG#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(EDU_SEQ),0) +1 FROM CCS_EDU_MGMT), #EDU_CD#, #EDU_SABUN#, #EDU_SDATE#, #EDU_EDATE#, #OBJ_CD#, #EDU_TIME_CD#, #OP_DEPT#, SYSDATE, #g_EmpNo#, SYSDATE, #g_EmpNo# )
